title: Vampire: Dream of the vampire
description: From the outside Eric had everything, he was Lord of all he surveyed, but he did not have everything until he met Jason, their love was instant, eternal and forbidden. Being a man of power and wealth Eric had enemies that would stop at nothing to see Eric fall. Their love is tried and tested Through the fires of hell all the way to the very heights of heaven. Through a twist of fate Eric becomes a vampire twisted with rage and a lust for revenge. He walks the centuries searching for redemption, never truly believing such a thing exists.
author: E.H. Hughes
